an3.51:1.1: Atha kho dve brahmana jinna vuddha mahallaka addhagata vayoanuppatta visavassasatika jatiya yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu.
an3.51:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te brahmana bhagavantam etadavocum:
an3.51:1.3: “mayamassu, bho gotama, brahmana jinna vuddha mahallaka addhagata vayoanuppatta visavassasatika jatiya;
an3.51:1.5: Ovadatu no bhavam gotamo, anusasatu no bhavam gotamo yam amhakam assa digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
an3.51:2.1: “Taggha tumhe, brahmana, jinna vuddha mahallaka addhagata vayoanuppatta visavassasatika jatiya;
an3.51:2.3: Upaniyati kho ayam, brahmana, loko jaraya byadhina maranena.
an3.51:2.4: Evam upaniyamane kho, brahmana, loke jaraya byadhina maranena, yo idha kayena samyamo vacaya samyamo manasa samyamo, tam tassa petassa tananca lenanca dipanca sarananca parayanancati.
